gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 114, Bulls 105
gameRecap.excerpt: The Mavericks defeated the Bulls, 114-105. Grant Williams led the way for the Mavericks with a career-high tying 25 points (7-9 3PM), while Luka Doncic added 18 points, 7 rebounds and 10 assists in the victory. Nikola Vucevic tallied 21 points and 20 rebounds for the Bulls in the losing effort, his 12th 20+ rebound game of his career. The Mavericks improve to 4-0 on the season, while the Bulls fall to 2-3.
